items.title: IREDA confident of recovery from Gensol EV assets, provisioning may not rise
items.description: IREDA was the first lender to file for insolvency against Gensol and has since seen an interim resolution professional (IRP) appointed. A meeting of the committee of creditors (CoC) was held last week and a resolution professional (RP) is expected to be confirmed this month.

items.title: Eternal Q1 FY26: Scaling up fast, but can it deliver margin consistency?
items.description: While the transition to an inventory-led model and continued store expansion could drive long-term margin expansion, execution risks remain elevated

items.title: Govt plans battery storage for thermal power plants amid renewable energy fluctuations
items.description: Operating thermal power plants at low capacity to allow higher injection of renewable energy into the grid during the day is expensive and leads to higher per unit cost of coal-fired electricity

items.title: M&M Financial Services' Q1 net profit rises 6% to Rs 529 crore
items.description: The company’s total consolidated income rose sharply to Rs 5,013 crore in Q1 FY26, marking a 15 percent year-on-year increase from Rs 4,355 crore in Q1 FY25

items.title: Air India seeks loan of about $200 million for Boeing 777 purchase
items.description: The purchase of aircraft takes place as Air India struggles to expand its fleet due to supply chain constraints impacting deliveries and its ability to get planes from the open market.

items.title: Coal India's 'attractiveness' based on cheap valuation an 'optical illusion', says Choice Broking
items.description: Coal India is allocated coal mines without having to bid for them, hence, according to the brokerage, the PSU is fulfilling the government's mandate of supplying coal to the nation.

items.title: Adani group seeks Competition Commission's nod to acquire Jaiprakash Associates
items.description: The development came after Adani group reportedly made an unconditional bid for debt-ridden Jaiprakash Associates Ltd (JAL), which is undergoing corporate insolvency resolution process
